title: Group portrait of wedding party with four men wearing tuxedos, including groom John Albert Parker, best man Eugene Jeffries, Leroy Bradshaw, and Pat Lockett; four women, including bride Christine Bradshaw Parker wearing long wedding gown with sheer yoke and holding bouquet of chrysanthemums, maid of honor Odessa Murray, Hurley Williams, and Jessica Houston; and flower girls Paula Whacke and Vernetta Easely, posed in front of dark crushed velvet curtain in Ebenezer Baptist Church
medium: black and white: Ansco Safety Film
